content: Prayer of an Old Man for Rescue.
Let me never be put to shame.
In Your righteousness deliver me and rescue me;
Incline Your ear to me and save me.
Be to me a rock of refuge  a sheltering stronghold to which I may continually come;
You have given the commandment to save me,
For You are my rock and my fortress.
Rescue me, O my God, from the hand of the wicked (godless),
From the grasp of the unrighteous and ruthless man.
O Lord ,  my trust  the source of my confidence from my youth.
Upon You have I relied  been sustained from my birth;
You are He who took me from my motherâ€™s womb  You have been my benefactor from that day.
My praise is continually of You.
